long_description:
As you enter, the walls are symmetrically covered with torches.  The room smells of smoke and there are ash piles on the floor.  When you hang a right at the corner towards the east end, there is a torch that looks different from all the rest; the material is more of a blue color rather than brown.

There is a door on the south end of the corridor.  There is a doorway on the east end of the corridor.  There is a door on the north end of the corridor.
short_description:
All of torches are light including a distinct blue torch on the east end.
There is a door(exit) on the south end, a doorway(exit) on the east end, and a door(exit) on the north end of the corridor.

Blue Torch.name: Blue Torch
Blue Torch.description: This torch, a different color from the rest, can be lit by hero.
